scripts.start: tsc set-env.ts && BACKEND_DOMAIN=http://localhost:5000 node set-env.js && angular-build-info && ng serve
scripts.build: tsc set-env.ts && BACKEND_DOMAIN=http://localhost:5000 node set-env.js && angular-build-info && ng build
scripts.build:docker: sed -i 's/\r//g' create_build_info.sh && sh ./create_build_info.sh && tsc set-env.ts && node set-env.js && ng build
scripts.start:docker: sed -i 's/\r//g' create_build_info.sh && sh ./create_build_info.sh && tsc ./set-env.ts && node ./set-env.js && ng serve --port 80 --host 0.0.0.0 --disable-host-check
scripts.watch: tsc set-env.ts && BACKEND_DOMAIN=http://localhost:5000 node set-env.js && ng build --watch --configuration development
